content.raw:
Hmmm that's a good point. In many cases, the SDF of the world is probably needed to save (or otherwise use) the complete SDF specification, but you're right in that we should be consistent. Otherwise, the same should then also be used for `Model`, `Actor` and `Light`.

It would be good to have such a "sdf wrapper" method available though to get a complete valid SDF. This could be a helper function somewhere. `gazebo.hh/.cc` is probably too high-level for such a helper function... `common/CommonIFace.hh/.cc` does not have SDF dependencies yet and seems too general too. Or we could add a method `Base::SDFRoot()` which returns the root after calling `Base::GetSDF()`.

Any preferences or other ideas where such a helper method could be placed?
